	<div class="site-content__layout site-content__layout--has-sidebar">
		
		
		
		<div id="primary" class="content-area">
			<main id="main" class="site-main">

				
<article class="article post-575149 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-top-news category-top-stories tag-mount-carmel-area-school-district" data-component="article">
	
<header class="article-header">
	<h1 class="article-title">
		Community reacts to canceled football season	</h1>

			<div class="article-eyebrow">
			<a href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-stories/">Top Stories</a>
		</div>
	
	
	<div class="article-meta">
					<p>by: <a href="https://www.pahomepage.com/author/rachael-espaillat/" title="Posts by Rachael Espaillat" class="author url fn" rel="author">Rachael Espaillat</a></p>
		
					Posted: <time datetime="2020-10-16T23:06:01-04:00">Oct 16, 2020 / 11:06 PM EDT</time>		
					<span class="article-meta--sep"> / </span>Updated: <time datetime="2020-10-16T23:06:22-04:00">Oct 16, 2020 / 11:06 PM EDT</time>			</div><!-- .article-meta -->

			<figure class="article-featured-media">
			<div class="media-wrapper">
				<figure class="ns-block-embed-anvato"><div class="ns-block-embed__wrapper"><div id="p9"></div></div><script data-anvato-params type="application/json">{"mcp":"LIN","width":"100%","height":"100%","video":"5946613","autoplay":true,"expect_preroll":true,"pInstance":"p9","plugins":{"comscore":{"clientId":"6036439","c3":"pahomepage.com","script":"//w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/plugins/comscore/comscoreplugin.min.js","useDerivedMetadata":true,"mapping":{"video":{"c3":"pahomepage.com","ns_st_st":"wbre","ns_st_pu":"Nexstar","ns_st_ge":"News,News,Video,Video,Video,Top Video","cs_ucfr":""},"ad":{"c3":"pahomepage.com","ns_st_st":"wbre","ns_st_pu":"Nexstar","ns_st_ge":"News,News,Video,Video,Video,Top Video","cs_ucfr":""}}},"dfp":{"adTagUrl":"https://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?sz=1x1000&iu=/5678/nx.wbre/top_stories&impl=s&gdfp_req=1&env=vp&output=vmap&unviewed_position_start=1&ad_rule=1&description_url=https://www.pahomepage.com/top-stories/community-reacts-to-canceled-football-season/&vconp=2&cust_params=vid%3D5946613%26cmsid%3D575149%26pid%3D575149%26vidcat%3D/top_stories%26bob_ck%3D[bob_ck_val]%26d_code%3Dna003"}},"accessKey":"VMJ9Y4Y7OvppJi6Y83ipduLpejzQkbjw","token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ2aWQiOiI1OTQ2NjEzIiwiaXNzIjoiVk1KOVk0WTdPdnBwSmk2WTgzaXBkdUxwZWp6UWtianciLCJleHAiOjE2MDI5ODkxNzh9.Zn4ClLHpbMlEcL-4iefF0oN1tbv5piUyIIacCqRANaQ","expectPrerollTimeout":8,"nxs":{"mp4Url":"https://nxsglobal.storage.googleapis.com/wbre/video/video_studio/561/20/10/16/5946613/5946613_E1A8E99D2DAC4F55A6B5EAC9D15B071A_201016_5946613_Community_reacts_to_cancelled_football_season_4000.mp4"},"disableMutedAutoplay":false,"recommendations":true,"expectPreroll":true,"titleVisible":true,"pauseOnClick":true,"trackTimePeriod":60}</script></figure>			</div>
		</figure>
	
	<div class="article-lead-share">
		
<div data-component="addThisInline" class="social-share addthis">
	<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>
</div>
	</div>
</header><!-- .article-header -->

	
	<div class="article-content rich-text">
		
		
<p><strong>MOUNT CARMEL, NORTHUMBERLAND COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) &#8211; </strong>The disappointment of a cancelled football season is hitting a local school community very hard tonight. </p>



<p>&#8220;I wish I wasn&#8217;t here tonight grocery shopping with my mom. I wish I was getting ready for a football game instead,&#8221; said Ben Kaminski, Mount Carmel. </p>



<p>An empty stadium on a night the Mount Carmel Tornadoes were scheduled to face Central Columbia. </p>



<p>Jaz Dominick Stadium should have been filled with people on a Friday night for a home game. But a hazing investigation threw the Mount Carmel Tornadoes for a whirlwind, Now the team is out for the season.</p>



<p>The school board canceled the season as the school district and Mount Carmel Township Police investigate the allegations. </p>



<p>People pled their case to keep the season going during a school board meeting Thursday night. </p>



<p>&#8220;You&#8217;re taking everything away from the whole team when the whole team is not involved. Even the cheerleaders were here last night at the school board meeting and the parents. I could see why they are upset,&#8221; said Mike Bradley, Mount Carmel.</p>



<p>&#8220;Make a decision on individuals or the team itself once you have the facts. And for what I understand, they don&#8217;t have the facts,&#8221; said Ben Kaminski, Mount Carmel. </p>



<p>Kaminski once played football for Mount Carmel before graduating in 1991. He said he did not participate in any hazing but says it&#8217;s something that has always gone on. </p>



<p>&#8220;In my day it was innocent. Get on stage and do an act or something,&#8221; said Kaminski.</p>



<p>Police would not specify what the allegations are but say the investigation is ongoing. </p>



<p>Kaminski and all the other Mount Carmel Tornado fans will have to wait until next season to see the team and take the field.</p>

		<div class="article-content-cta-group">
					</div>
	</div><!-- .rich-text -->

	
<footer class="article-footer">

	<aside class="article-list article-list--full-width">
		

	<h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
		More Top Stories Stories	</h2>


<div class="article-list__content">
						<a class="article-list__blanketing-link" href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-stories/double-fatal-crash-in-schuylkill-county/">
		
		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"
			data-article-id="576255"
			data-index="0"
			data-collection="article-list1"
			data-anvato-params="null"
		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list1"

>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				Double fatal crash in Schuylkill County
					</h3>
	
						<footer class="article-list__article-meta">
				<time datetime="2020-10-17T21:08:33-04:00">Oct 17, 2020</time>			</footer>
			
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			
				<p>SCHUYLKILL COUNTY, REILLY TOWNSHIP (WBRE/WYOU) - A young man and woman are dead after a crash in Schuylkill County.</p>
<p>It happened Saturday morning around 3:30 a.m. in Reilly Township along Route 209.</p>

					</div>
	
			<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
							<span>
					Read the Full Article

		<article

<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list1"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 876px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				Furry Friends Food Bank opens in Monroe County
					</h3>
	
						<footer class="article-list__article-byline">
				by Revathi Janaswamy <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-17T18:13:39-04:00">Oct 17, 2020</time>			</footer>
			
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			
				<p>STROUDSBURG, MONROE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) - Furry Friends Food Bank finally opened its doors Saturday afternoon, stocked with food for cats, dogs, pigs and other animals. </p>
<p>"We are a 501-C non-profit. We are here to help support Monroe County and the surrounding counties for people that are struggling to feed their pets," said Felicia Katz, President, Furry Friends Food Bank. </p>

					</div>
	
			<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
							<span>
					Read the Full Article
											<span class="icon icon--arrow">
	<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">

	</svg>
</span>

	</div>

			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				One-on-one interview with Vice President Mike Pence
					</h3>
	
						<footer class="article-list__article-byline">
				by Andy Mehalshick <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-17T18:07:54-04:00">Oct 17, 2020</time>			</footer>
			
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			
				<p>READING, BERKS COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) - After Vice President Mike Pence's campaign rally in Berks County on Saturday, Eyewitness News spoke one-on-one with the Vice President. </p>
<p>The I-Team's Andy Mehalshick asked the Vice President questions concerning several key issues in the election. </p>

					</div>

		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type"
			data-article-id="576076"

		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list2"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 320px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
							<a
					href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-stories/furry-friends-food-bank-opens-in-monroe-county/"
									>
			
				Furry Friends Food Bank opens in Monroe County
							</a>
					</h3>
	
				
	
	
	</div>


	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb">

				href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-stories/furry-friends-food-bank-opens-in-monroe-county/"

		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type"
			data-article-id="575781"

		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list3"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 320px&quot;]"
>
			<h2 class="article-list__article-title">
							<a
					href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-news/vice-president-pence-visiting-reading-pennsylvania/"
									>
			
				Vice President Pence visits Reading
							</a>
					</h2>
	
				
	
	
	</div>


	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
					<a
				href="https://www.pahomepage.com/top-news/vice-president-pence-visiting-reading-pennsylvania/"
							>
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
			
<div
	class="image-wrapper landscape square-on-mobile"
	>
	<img

		<article

		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"

	class="article-list__article-text"

	class="article-list__article-text"

			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
